text.ACTION: On January 15, 2066, General Herres sent this datapoint to Elisabet Sobeck to archive within APOLLO, cross-referencing it with all mentions of his name and Operation Enduring Victory, wanting it to be an allocution of crimes he considers himself to be responsible for during Enduring Victory and an apology to future humans.(1) However, Elisabet was unable to archive it as the stacks had been closed, instead leaving it within the Zero Dawn Project Facility.
As she was exploring the Zero Dawn Project Facility, Aloy was able to recover this datapoint.
